metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Phantom and a Rose is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Phantom and a Rose has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Minor,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
